mainBoard.name: Jace, Arcane Strategist
mainBoard.originalText:
Whenever you draw your second card each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
+1: Draw a card.
−7: Creatures you control can't be blocked this turn.

rulings.text: If a spell or ability causes you to put cards into your hand without specifically using the word “draw,” it’s not a card drawn.

If an effect instructs you to draw multiple cards, Jace’s first ability triggers after you draw whichever is the second one for the turn (if any). You choose a target for the ability after you’ve drawn all of the cards.
Jace’s first ability can trigger only once each turn. It doesn’t matter whether Jace was on the battlefield when the first card was drawn.
Once Jace’s last ability has resolved, its effect applies even if Jace has left the battlefield.

mainBoard.name: Faerie Vandal
mainBoard.originalText:
Flash
Flying
Whenever you draw your second card each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Faerie Vandal.

rulings.text: If a spell or ability causes you to put cards into your hand without specifically using the word "draw," it's not a card drawn.

If an effect instructs you to draw multiple cards, the ability triggers after you draw whichever is the second one for the turn. You choose a target (if any) for the ability after you've drawn and looked at all of the cards and finished resolving the spell or ability that caused you to draw them.

The triggered ability can trigger only once each turn. It doesn't matter whether the permanent with that ability was on the battlefield when the first card was drawn. If it's not on the battlefield when the second card is drawn, the ability can't trigger at all that turn. It won't trigger when the third or fourth card is drawn.

foreignData.flavorText: È facile essere sempre un passo avanti a tutti quando puoi leggere ogni loro pensiero.
foreignData.name: Lettura dell'Anima
foreignData.text:
Scegli uno —
• Neutralizza una magia bersaglio a meno che il suo controllore non paghi {4}.
• Pesca due carte.

foreignData.flavorText: その者のすべての思考が読めるなら、先手を打つのは容易である。
foreignData.name: 魂読み
foreignData.text:
以下から１つを選ぶ。
・呪文１つを対象とする。それのコントローラーが{4}を支払わないかぎり、それを打ち消す。
・カード２枚を引く。

foreignData.flavorText: 如果你能看清对手每道思绪，那么能预先考虑两步也并非难事。
foreignData.name: 读取魂魄
foreignData.text:
选择一项～
•除非目标咒语的操控者支付{4}，否则反击之。
•抓两张牌。

mainBoard.name: Soul Read
mainBoard.originalText:
Choose one —
• Counter target spell unless its controller pays {4}.
• Draw two cards.
mainBoard.text:
Choose one —
• Counter target spell unless its controller pays {4}.
• Draw two cards.

mainBoard.flavorText: Serum was once derived from Mirrodin's blinkmoths, offering visions of inspiration. Now it is pulled from Phyrexian inkmoths, yielding visions of perfection.

foreignData.flavorText: Das Serum wurde einst aus Mirrodins Blinkmotten gewonnen und bot Visionen der Inspiration. Nun stammt es aus phyrexianischen Tintenmotten und bietet Visionen der Perfektion.
foreignData.name: Visionen nach Serumsgenuss
foreignData.text: Ziehe eine Karte. Hellsicht 2. (Schaue dir die obersten zwei Karten deiner Bibliothek an. Du kannst eine beliebige Anzahl davon unter deine Bibliothek legen und den Rest in beliebiger Reihenfolge oben darauf.)

foreignData.flavorText: El suero derivaba de las polillas titilantes de Mirrodin y ofrecía visiones inspiradoras. Ahora proviene de las polillas de tinta pirexianas y concede visiones de perfección.
foreignData.name: Visiones del suero
foreignData.text: Roba una carta. Adivina 2. (Mira las dos primeras cartas de tu biblioteca, luego pon cualquier cantidad de ellas en el fondo de tu biblioteca y el resto en la parte superior en cualquier orden.)

foreignData.flavorText: Le sérum était autrefois dérivé des scintimites de Mirrodin, et il offrait des visions d'inspiration. Désormais, il est extrait des encrimites phyrexians, imposant des visions de perfection.
foreignData.name: Visions nées du sérum
foreignData.text: Piochez une carte. Regard 2. (Regardez les deux cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Mettez n'importe quel nombre d'entre elles au-dessous de votre bibliothèque et le reste, au-dessus, dans l'ordre de votre choix.)

foreignData.flavorText: Il siero veniva un tempo ricavato dai lampidotteri di Mirrodin e induceva visioni ispiratrici. Ora viene estratto dagli atrodotteri di Phyrexia e produce visioni di perfezione.
foreignData.name: Visioni del Siero
foreignData.text: Pesca una carta. Profetizza 2. (Guarda le prime due carte del tuo grimorio, poi mettine un qualsiasi numero in fondo al tuo grimorio e le altre in cima in qualsiasi ordine.)

foreignData.flavorText: かつて、血清はミラディンのちらつき蛾から採取されて霊感の幻視をもたらしていた。現在の血清はファイレクシアの墨蛾から採取されて完成の幻視をもたらす。
foreignData.name: 血清の幻視
foreignData.text: カード１枚を引く。占術２を行う。（あなたのライブラリーの一番上にあるカード２枚を見て、そのうちの望む枚数をあなたのライブラリーの一番下に、残りを一番上に、それぞれ望む順番で置く。）

foreignData.flavorText: 原本采自秘罗地光蛾的浆液，可让饮者眼中见得启悟。如今浆液萃自非瑞克西亚墨蛾，能令受者眼中得见完美。
foreignData.name: 浆液预视
foreignData.text: 抓一张牌。占卜2。（检视你牌库顶的两张牌，然后将其中任意数量的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底，其余则以任意顺序置于你牌库顶。）

mainBoard.name: Serum Visions
mainBoard.originalText: Draw a card. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

mainBoard.flavorText: Some took to their boats to escape the unfolding nightmare. The remains of their vessels now litter the shores of Nephalia.

foreignData.flavorText: Einige versuchten, dem Albtraum in ihren Booten zu entkommen. Die Überreste ihrer Kähne säumen nun die Strände von Nefalen.
foreignData.name: Hinunterziehen
foreignData.text:
Bringe eine Kreatur deiner Wahl auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück.
Ziehe eine Karte.

foreignData.flavorText: Algunos se hicieron a la mar para escapar de la pesadilla desatada. Los restos de sus navíos están esparcidos por las costas de Nephalia.
foreignData.name: Arrastrar al fondo
foreignData.text:
Regresa la criatura objetivo a la mano de su propietario.
Roba una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: Certains prirent leurs bateaux pour fuir ce cauchemar. Les épaves reposent aujourd'hui le long des côtes de Néphalie.
foreignData.name: Engloutir
foreignData.text:
Renvoyez une créature ciblée dans la main de son propriétaire.
Piochez une carte.

foreignData.flavorText: Alcuni ricorsero alle imbarcazioni per sfuggire all'incubo dilagante. Ora le coste di Nephalia sono disseminate dei loro resti.
foreignData.name: Inabissare
foreignData.text:
Fai tornare una creatura bersaglio in mano al suo proprietario.
Pesca una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: 次々と起きる悪夢から小舟で逃げ出そうとする者もいた。今では、それらの船の残骸がネファリアの岸を覆っている。
foreignData.name: 引きずり込み
foreignData.text:
クリーチャー１体を対象とする。それをオーナーの手札に戻す。
カード１枚を引く。

foreignData.flavorText: 有些人驾船逃离日愈加剧的噩梦。那些船的残骸如今散落在涅非利亚海岸边。
foreignData.name: 拖入汪洋
foreignData.text:
将目标生物移回其拥有者手上。
抓一张牌。

mainBoard.name: Drag Under
mainBoard.originalText:
Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.

rulings.text: If the targeted creature becomes an illegal target before Drag Under resolves, you won't draw a card.

mainBoard.flavorText: All the wonders of the natural world in one breathtaking microcosm.

foreignData.flavorText: Alle Wunder der natürlichen Welt in einem einzigen atemberaubenden Mikrokosmos.

foreignData.flavorText: Todas las maravillas del mundo natural en un microcosmos asombroso.

En cuanto el Islote floreciente entre al campo de batalla, elige un color que no sea azul.

foreignData.flavorText: 自然界のあらゆる驚異がこの美しく小さな世界に詰まっている。
